events.text: You really seem to like that stuff. The parts, I mean.
I know it’s going to sound like I’m crazy, but the only thing that’s seemed to stay the same after the ozone explosion were these parts.
Well, almost everything…
What's different?
The parts are all I’ve known since I was a kid and making things out of them definitely hasn’t changed, but...
Before all of this, I used to get these… little whispers in my head.
After I became altered from the radiation, I found out that it was actually Jarvis.
He’s a passenger in my ship and a very unruly one at that.
Who's...Jarvis?
Julius...
You must have a few screws loose in there if you think Jarvis is actually-
STOP!
Don’t. Say. Another. Word.
You’ll make him mad…
And I won’t be able to stop him from hurting you…
No one else is here.
(Like The Amazing Steiner?)
Right…
Julius’s respect for you has fallen.
Jarvis rumbles within Julius.
If you say so.

events.choice: Why are you with Gaia's Advocates?

events.text: What made you want to join Gaia’s Advocates?
They told me that I could create as many tools as I wanted working with them.
That’s all I really wanted.
It...gives my ‘interest’ value to others.
Even Jarvis approves!
Well, good for Jarvis then.
Believe me when I say he really appreciates it!
Julius’s respect for you has risen!
Jarvis slumbers within Julius.
What about the planet?
Isn’t that what this is all about?
I understand that we need you to fix the planet and that’s important.
Right now, my tools are helping those who want to help the planet, so I guess that’s good enough for me really.
Maybe when everything is better other people besides Gaia’s Advocates might need my tools.
Someday…
Until then, I’m just worried about getting parts for our power saw.
You seem to really like parts and fixing them. Is that your skill?
Yeah, I’m a technician so if you can get me the right parts I can make tools for us to use for our mission.
I’m not that good at conversation like Leo, but if I see something we could use I’ll let you know.
In combat, I can use any of our tools more effectively than anyone else.
If Jarvis is here…
If Jarvis is here, he won’t listen to reason from anyone.
And he won’t stop until anyone that’s trying to hurt him...isn't anymore.
Makes sense to me.
It sounds to me that Jarvis is way too much of a liability.
If he’s that uncontrollable then he’s clearly dangerous.
Julius’s respect for you has fallen
Jarvis rumbles within Julius.
As long as we find some extra parts I guess it won’t be a waste of time.

metadata.name: 1.2.3 Getting to Know Your Team Julius
